element.name: Reason for Refusal/Release
element.definition: Describes reason(s) for the patient's refusal of care/transport OR the EMS clinician's decision to release the patient.
element.v3Comment: This works in combination with the dispositions and signatures to provide general categories for the patient refusal. Specific legal refusal language should be developed by the agency's legal counsel and provided to the patient or guardian upon refusal per local policies.
element.v3Changes: Element added with the release of v3.5.0
